Package BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors

Class SparkMaxFaults

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors.SparkMaxFaults
All Implemented Interfaces:
FaultsWrapper
public class SparkMaxFaults extends Object implements FaultsWrapper
Handles fault management for SparkMax motor controllers. Provides functionality for creating and managing alerts for various fault conditions.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    SparkMaxFaults.faults
    Enumeration of possible faults that can occur in the SparkMax motor controller.
